duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and supervise a team of professionals in applying for grants and developing sustainability projects and programs.
Supervise staff in developing presentations and grant application materials related to sustainability and energy efficiency projects.
Organize special events to increase exposure of sustainability goals and objectives.
Collaborate with agencies, service providers, and non-profit organizations in identifying funding and developing sustainability initiatives.
Establish and maintain relationships with external sustainability-focused organizations and partners.
Manage and update the Sustainability Initiatives Unit website.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Sustainability, Architecture, or Marketing (LEED Certification preferred)
